__e: Apparently, I must have done something you liked... dudes.
I know I didn't deserve your help after the way I spoke to you.
Than if thou never hadst deserved our hate.
He ain't earned a death at my hands.
For in the short time that Emily worked for us, I found her most dependable.
Nor did he deserve the end that he met.
If anyone has ever deserved to be on your table, it's this son of a bitch.
If ever a man deserved to die, it was him.
And if this is the guy who broke in my house and killed my husband, then he deserved to die.
